script: Ever tried to remember a story word by word? That’s what RNNs do! They’re neural networks that process sequences—like sentences or time series—by looping information back into themselves. Imagine reading a book where each page reminds you of the last one. That’s an RNN! It’s great for tasks like predicting the next word in a sentence or translating languages. Without RNNs, AI would struggle with anything that unfolds over time. They’re the secret sauce behind chatbots, voice assistants, and even stock market predictions. Pretty cool, right?
